author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Never noticed the amount of fun on that stream. Good job to Japanese fandeads.

I wanted to join, but I couldn't join due to my bad connection, my lack of knowledge about speaking japanese (I only speak english and spanish, that last mentioned is my native language), Japanese fandeads' speed and also here were I live was too cold and 13 hours of difference.
Only I'm limited to laugh or smile.
That ended with a happy ending.

And also, because today Rushia reached 1.300.000 Subscribers today.
